channel.title: Walking/Running glitch ~Read~
channel.description:
Ok I will explain this for someone can answer correctly
Problem: Walking/Running walks by squares
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r_B6grlf80U
Questions: Is this client sided or Source sided?
Where can I find the walking/running method?
What is the solution for this?
Info: 317 source x-rebornz source Deltabase It is not the connection because I have used my vps with another source and it did not do this.
[size=36pt]Please Help!!!!!!!!![/size]

item.title: Walking/Running glitch ~Read~
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

That always used to happen on runescape because it was laggy :p. Check in your server for a file about walking.java or something similar and just delete that and copy one from a source that doesnt have that problem

Read full topic
